features: SmartCompliance refill is for First Aid Only part numbers 1000-FAE-0103, 1001-FAE-0103, 1300-FAE-0103, 1301-FAE-0103 and 1050-FAE-0103.
Hold sterile dressings in place with this flexible, sterile soft gauze roll
Provides flexibility for movement if needed
Each roll contains approximately 4 yards of conforming gauze
Not made with natural rubber latex
body.description: The SmartCompliance refill system for reordering and restocking your First Aid cabinet revolutionizes replenishment. It is quick, easy, and cost effective. As supplies are used, SmartTab ezRefill reminder tabs notify you when it is time to reorder supplies and puts the reorder information at your fingertips. The SmartCompliance Insert Maps also allow you to customize your cabinet to meet your specific first aid needs. SmartCompliance Refill with 1 roll of 3" conforming gauze roll per box. Hold dressings in place with conforming gauze that won't cling to hair or skin. Soft and absorbent, the gauze can hold dressing on wounds, yet provide flexibility for movement if needed. Each roll contains approximately 4 yards of conforming gauze and the 3" width helps cover wounds quickly. This refill is used in First Aid Only SmartCompliance cabinets: 1000-FAE-0103, 1001-FAE-0103, 1300-FAE-0103, 1301-FAE-0103 and 1050-FAE-0103.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SmartCompliance Refills: A Revolutionary First Aid System The SmartCompliance refill system for reordering and restocking your First Aid cabinet revolutionizes replenishment. It is quick, easy, and cost effective. As supplies are used, SmartTab ezRefill reminder tabs notify you when it is time to reorder supplies and puts the reorder information at your fingertips. The FAO SafetyHub app allows you to monitor cabinet usage to stay compliant and know when to reorder your refills. The SmartCompliance Insert Maps also allow you to customize your cabinet to meet your specific first aid needs.

Option 1: SafetyHub App The innovative SmartCompliance Program by First Aid Only redefines business first aid and the SmartCompliance requisition app, SafetyHub, takes it to the next level. The SafetyHub app features allow you to manage users, requests and cabinets in a centralized location to easily requisition SmartCompliance cabinet refills and access inventory data. SafetyHub keeps you organized and in compliance, so you have your cabinet inventory status at your fingertips. Compatible with Android and iOS devices. Option 2: SmartTab ezRefill Tab The SmartTab ezRefill System makes refills easy to identify and reorder. When you see a bright yellow SmartTab inside a SmartCompliance refill box it’s time to reorder. Item information and an easy to scan barcode are all at your fingertips. Option 3: Cabinet Insert Map & Box Size Legend Missing a refill box in your SmartCompliance First Aid Cabinet? Check the schematics in the back of your First Aid Only SmartCompliance cabinet to help select the right refill to order for your cabinet.
